name: Mana's Bond
effects: Increase resistance to all status effects by 50%

name: Mana's Bond
瑪娜血脈
마나의 핏줄
Lien de mana
Erbe des Mana
Vínculo de mana
desc_short: Boost ATK by 10% and resistance to poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone
提高10%攻擊、中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化耐性
공격력 10%, 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 저항력 상승
Augmente l'ATT de 10% et la rés. au poison, à cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie et pétrification
Erhöht ANG um 10% und Resist. gegen Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein.
Aumenta el ATQ un 10% y la res. al ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, conf, enf y pie
desc_long: Boosts ATK by 10% and resistance to poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone.
提高10%攻擊的數值，同時提高中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化耐性。
공격력이 10%, 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 질병, 석화 저항력이 상승합니다.
Augmente l'ATT de 10% et la rés. au poison, à cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie et pétrification
Erhöht ANG um 10% und Resist. gegen Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein.
Aumenta el ATQ un 10% y la resistencia al veneno, ceguera, sueño, silencio, parálisis, confusión, enfermedad y piedra.
